name: GameAchievementsAPI
description: Achievements API is used to configure achievements for a specific game by exposing all Achievements-related CRUD operations.

requests.name: Get specific achievement
requests.description:
If Achievement exists returns JSON of achivement with folowing properties:

    "displayName"
    "description"
    "icon"
    "displayOrder"
    "id"
    
If not returns  HTTP 404 with Achievement not found exception

requests.name: Delete all achievements for given Game Id
requests.description: Returns HTTP 200 OK status if game is found, HTTP 404 with GameNotFound exception is game with given id doesn't exist

requests.name: Updates achievement with given Id
requests.description:
Returns HTTP 20 OK status with updated Achievement URL for GET reguest.

Validates input:
DispalyName can't be null
DisplayName size must be between 1 and 100 characters

Description can't be null
Description must be between 1 and 500 characters

Icon must be valid URL 

DisplayOrder must be positiv int
If it is null, will be set to (default) 1.

Validates that Game exists.
Validates that Achievement for given Game exists.
Validates that Achievement with same DisplayName for the same Game doesn't already exist.
requests.rawModeData:
{
    "displayName": "Test name updated",
    "description": "Test desc updated",
    "icon": "https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Cute-Ball-Go-icon.png",
    "displayOrder": 3,
    "id": "will be ignored if sent"
}

requests.name: Create Achievement
requests.description:
Creates new achievement
Returns HTTP 201 created with URL of new achievement.

Validates input:
DispalyName can't be null
DisplayName size must be between 1 and 100 characters

Description can't be null
Description must be between 1 and 500 characters

Icon must be valid URL 

DisplayOrder must be positiv int
If it is null, will be set to (default) 1.

Validates that Game exists

Validates that Achievement with same DisplayName for the same Game doesn't exist.

requests.name: Deletes achievement with given Id.
requests.description:
If found, achievement will be deleted and HTTP 200 OK status will be returned.
If not, HTTP404 with AchievementNotFound exception

requests.name: Get all achievements for given game Id
requests.description:
Returns List of achievements as JSONs with folowing propeties:

        "displayName",
        "description",
        "icon",
        "displayOrder",
        "id"
If there is no achievement for given Game Id returns empty List.
